name: Socialtext wiki syntax highlighting
summary: Syntax highlighting and an ftplugin for Socialtext wiki
description:
Syntax highlighting for the Socialtext wiki, http://www.socialtext.net/. Also a filetype detection script which sets appropriate buffer-local options for editing long lines, etc.

Latest copy can be found at http://www.georgevreilly.com/vim/stwiki/
install_details:
Create a HOME directory, if you haven't already
Create a "vimfiles" (Windows) or ".vim" (Unix/Mac) folder in your HOME directory.
Unzip stwiki.zip in that vimfiles (.vim) folder.
Restart Vim

See ":help add-global-plugin" for more details

versions.release_notes: Changed DOS line endings to Unix format.
Use forward slashes in the ftplugin, not backslashes.
